name: Retro Seconds
description:
Hello there,  Great Player!!
You are about to play a game where you will have to destroy loads of enemies while you travel through time!!
And all that in a battle field shaped like a rewind clock!!!
So get ready to gallop across different Eras with different weapons and Celebrate once you make the world a better place!!

Use Arrow keys or WASD to move and Mouse to aim and shoot!!
Get, Set, Shoot!!

PS. for a better experience, you can zoom in or out in your browser using 

(ctrl + mouse scroll) 

Connect with us!!
